definition: Nancy Pelosi (1940-), US Democrat politician from California, speaker of US House of Representatives from 2007
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: As the Speaker said, we've got more to do.
sentences.chinese: 正如佩洛西所說的，我們還有許多事情要做。

sentences.english: However, Pelosi said she would keep to the schedule.
sentences.chinese: 儘管如此，佩洛西說她將繼續執行這個時間表。

sentences.english: Dressed in a grey trouser suit, Pelosi seemed almost deferential in her manner.
sentences.chinese: 佩洛西穿着灰色的西裝褲，看起來畢恭畢敬的。

sentences.english: Nacy Pelosy is a self-interested thick-skinned political thug.
sentences.chinese: 南希佩洛西是個個人利益的無恥的政治流氓。

sentences.english: Ms Pelosi is preparing to torment the president with some subtlety.
sentences.chinese: 佩洛西女士正準備總統的一些微妙的折磨。

definition: member of the US House of Representatives
Dianne Feinstein (1933-), US Senator from California
Clinton (name)/Bill Clinton (1946-), US Democratic politician, President 1993-2001/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
abbr. for 參議院|参议院[can1 yi4 yuan4], senate/upper chamber (of legislative assembly)
Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-
